overview: Muezzin Siddiq of a local mosque in Manpura Island discovered the body of a prostitute on the floor of his house in the early morning. Siddiq does not think about how this body came to his house. In this village, Siddique has no one to call his own except the Imam of the mosque. Siddiq goes to tell him, but can't say anything out of fear and shame. What will Siddique do with this body?
title: Araal
